1.name: Enhanced Login System
1.notes: Implemented comprehensive login system with validation, loading states, session management, security features, and role-based redirection

3.name: Main Dashboard Enhancement
3.notes: Implemented comprehensive dashboard with role-based navigation, real-time stock alerts, system health indicators, quick action buttons, and activity feed. Includes five main sections: Overview, Stock Alerts, System Health, Quick Actions, and Activity.

7.name: Product List Enhanced
7.notes: Implemented comprehensive enhanced product list with advanced filtering (category, supplier, price range, stock status), multi-column sorting, search functionality, bulk operations menu, stock status indicators, pagination, role-based permissions, and quick action buttons. Includes detailed product view and real-time inventory integration.

8.name: Product Form Enhanced
8.notes: Implemented comprehensive enhanced product form with auto SKU generation, category hierarchy selector, supplier dropdown with search, multiple pricing fields (cost, retail, wholesale), barcode input with validation, weight and dimensions fields, image placeholder support, advanced validation, role-based access control, and enhanced UX with state management for category/supplier picking.

9.name: Product Detail View
9.notes: Implemented comprehensive product detail view with complete product information display, stock levels across all locations, recent movement history, quick stock adjustment functionality, and transfer initiation capability. Includes role-based access control and real-time data loading.

10.name: Category Tree View
10.notes: Implemented comprehensive category tree view with expandable/collapsible hierarchy, breadcrumb navigation, search functionality, selection mode for product assignment, keyboard navigation (j/k for movement, h/l for collapse/expand), role-based permissions, and tree visualization with level indicators. Features include drag-drop simulation, category path display, product count indicators, and comprehensive help system.

11.name: Category Management Page
11.notes: Implemented comprehensive category management interface with category CRUD operations, hierarchy display with parent-child relationship indicators, product count per category, bulk category operations (activate/deactivate/move/delete), advanced filtering (level, parent, search term, product count), sortable table and hierarchy view modes, role-based permissions, multi-select functionality, confirmation dialogs for destructive operations, and comprehensive keyboard navigation with help system.

12.name: Category Form
12.notes: Implemented comprehensive category creation and editing form with name and description input validation, parent category selector with hierarchy display, path preview functionality, circular reference prevention, level validation with maximum depth checking, duplicate name prevention within parent scope, active status toggle, real-time input validation with error messages, keyboard navigation with tab support, and comprehensive help system. Features dual mode support (create/edit) with proper state management.

13.name: Stock Levels Dashboard
13.notes: Implemented comprehensive stock levels dashboard with multi-location inventory display, stock level indicators (high/medium/low/zero), low stock alerts highlighting, reorder suggestions, location-based filtering, export functionality, three view modes (table/cards/summary), advanced filtering, multi-column sorting, search functionality, bulk operations, pagination, role-based permissions, quick action buttons (adjust/transfer/history), real-time data loading, and comprehensive keyboard navigation with help system.

14.name: Stock Adjustment Interface
14.notes: Implemented comprehensive stock adjustment interface with product selection with search, location dropdown, quantity adjustment input, reason code selection, batch adjustment capability, preview before commit, three view modes (single/batch/preview), real-time calculation preview, comprehensive input validation, negative stock warnings, keyboard navigation, multiple adjustment types (increase/decrease/set), 12 predefined reason codes, role-based access control, loading states, error handling, and comprehensive help system. Features advanced UX with tabbed field navigation and confirmation dialogs.

15.name: Stock Transfer System
15.notes: Implemented comprehensive stock transfer system with from/to location selection, product picker with current stock display, quantity validation, multi-product transfers, transfer confirmation dialog, transfer history tracking, four view modes (single/multi/confirm/history), real-time stock availability display, comprehensive input validation, same-location prevention, insufficient stock warnings, keyboard navigation, batch transfer capabilities, detailed confirmation preview with warnings, transfer impact analysis, comprehensive help system, and full audit trail support. Features advanced UX with location filtering and visual stock indicators.

16.name: Stock Movement History
16.notes: Implemented comprehensive stock movement history viewer with movement log table, pagination, date range filtering, movement type filtering, user activity tracking, export capabilities, movement details popup, four view modes (list/filters/details/export), advanced filtering system with 7 filter fields (date range, product, location, user, movement type, quantity), comprehensive keyboard navigation, real-time data loading, detailed movement information display with color-coded quantities, export functionality for CSV/JSON/PDF formats, help system, and full audit trail support. Features integration with business service layer, role-based access control, and consistent styling patterns.

17.name: Location Management
17.notes: Implemented comprehensive location management interface with location CRUD operations, location list with type indicators (warehouse/store/online), stock summary per location with total products/stock/low stock/zero stock counts, active/inactive status toggle, location filtering by type and status, bulk operations (activate/deactivate/delete), three view modes (list/bulk/confirm), comprehensive keyboard navigation, pagination support, stock value calculation, selection system with multi-select capability, confirmation dialogs for destructive operations, real-time data loading, and integration with location and inventory repositories. Features role-based access control, consistent styling, help system, and proper error handling.
